headline: AppLovin Appoints Maynard Webb to Its Board of Directors
summary: PALO ALTO, Calif., April 09, 2025--AppLovin Corporation (NASDAQ: APP) ("AppLovin" or the "Company"), the leading marketing platform, today announced the appointment of Maynard Webb, founder of Webb Investment Network (WIN), to AppLovin’s Board of Directors, as an independent director and member of the Audit Committee and Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee of the Board.

headline: 2 of Wall Street’s Favorite Stocks with Exciting Potential and 1 to Keep Off Your Radar
summary: The stocks in this article have caught Wall Street’s attention in a big way, with price targets implying returns above 20%. But investors should take these forecasts with a grain of salt because analysts typically say nice things about companies so their firms can win business in other product lines like M&A advisory.
